phytoplankton parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 0.04 mmol P/m3 half saturation constant
phytoplankton parameter: 1/d - nitrogen fixation rate by blue green algae (cyanobacteria)
zooplankton parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 0.08 mmol P/m3 half saturation constant

zooplankton parameter: dimensionless fraction -fraction of grazing egested
shell production parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 4.0 mmol Si/m3 half saturation constant
